thread.section_title: HelloFresh US Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of HelloFresh US | hellofresh.com | 4 of 259
thread.title: Jennifer

author: Jennifer
title: Jennifer
text: I have been cooking for many, many years. And felt that I'd fallen into a rut I couldn't climb out of. Then I found Hello Fresh, and it's like I'm learning how to cook all over again! Thank you Hello Fresh for introducing me to new foods, spices, cooking techniques, and more that has turned cooking from a dreaded chore to a rewarding activity. Every meal has been excellent - and not just the flavors, but the freshness, the instruction materials, the shipping....everything! I am truly impressed and thankful that Hello Fresh has gotten me back into eating fresh, clean, and healthy food again! I honestly do feel a lot better!
